prompt: Craft a luxurious coming soon page with a centered layout and an elegant aesthetic. Feature a large 'Coming Soon' title in a serif gold (hex: #D4AF37) font with a subtle shadow. Include a subtitle in a smaller white font describing a premium app experience. Display a circular progress indicator with a silver (hex: #B0BEC5) ring and a percentage label below. Add an email input field with ornate borders and a gold subscribe button with a slight gradient. Place social media icons (LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram) in a horizontal row at the bottom with a hover-like effect. Use a deep navy (hex: #0A192F) background with a linear gradient to black for sophistication. Apply generous padding and spacing for a refined, upscale look.
